description:
The Cormac Arc’word long sleeve tee is your go-to for versatile performance and comfort during high-output activities like running, climbing, or hiking. Crafted with recycled Phasic™ LT fabric, this engineered polyester delivers top-notch moisture-wicking, breathability, and a luxurious, silky feel.

  • Recycled Phasic LT™ is highly breathable to help regulate your temperate and keep you comfortable
  • Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection
  • Underarm gussets allow freedom of movement
  • Anti-odour treatment helps keep things smelling fresh
  • Low-profile merrow stitching reduces hot spots
  • Regular fit feels like an old favourite since day 1
name: Arc'teryx Cormac Arc'word Long Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
